tool_description: Generates comprehensive analytical reports combining geochemical and mineralogical data with quality control information, statistical summaries, and interpretations formatted according to industry standards.

sample_ids.description: Array of sample IDs to include in the report

report_sections.description: Sections to include: summary, methods, results, qc_data, interpretation, appendices

client_name.description: Name of the client or organization

report_format.description: Output format: PDF, HTML, or CSV_data_only

include_plots.description: Include data visualization plots in report

confidentiality_level.description: Confidentiality marking: public, internal, confidential, or restricted

authorized_signatory.description: Name of authorized person signing the report

custom_comments.description: Additional comments or notes for the report

error_messages: Invalid report_sections: Use one or more of [summary, methods, results, qc_data, interpretation, appendices].
Samples not analyzed: All samples must have completed analytical data before report generation.
Invalid report_format: Use one of [PDF, HTML, CSV_data_only].
Invalid confidentiality_level: Use one of [public, internal, confidential, restricted].
Missing required fields: report_title, client_name, project_reference, authorized_signatory are required.
Invalid report_date: Must be valid ISO 8601 format and not in the future.
usage: Provide report_title, sample_ids, report_sections, client_name, project_reference, report_date, and authorized_signatory; optionally set report_format, include_plots, confidentiality_level, laboratory_accreditation, and custom_comments.

total_pages.description: Number of pages in the generated report

samples_included.description: Number of samples included in the report

generation_status.description: Status of report generation: completed or failed
